title: Mobile Language Leadership Course for Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Language Education Theory and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Program for learners in managerial/leadership roles within corporations to enhance language education competencies in a blended learning environment. Project-based assessment evaluates practical application skills in real work contexts.

learning_goals: In a blended learning environment, the learner can plan and execute self-directed learning at least twice a week using mobile microlearning content.
The learner designs a blended learning strategy integrating online and offline activities to complete 2 or more team-based language education projects within 6 months.
In a BYOD environment, the learner can document and share learning outcomes with 80% or higher accuracy using collaborative tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Notion).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
